publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3375 Mrs Nanette Milne: Breast Cancer Awareness Month—That the Parliament welcomes Breast Cancer Awareness Month 2005; notes that Breast Cancer Awareness Month aims to increase awareness of the disease among both the public and health professionals, raise funds for research into the cause, prevention and cure of the disease and offer vital information and support to those affected, and further notes that breast cancer is the most common cancer in women in Scotland, accounting for one in three of all cancers detected in women living in Scotland. Supported by: Brian Adam*, John Scott*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Robin Harper*, Mike Pringle*, Fiona Hyslop*, Linda Fabiani*, Bill Butler*, Alex Johnstone*, Mary Scanlon*, Derek Brownlee*, Tommy Sheridan*, Christine Grahame*, Sarah Boyack*

S2M-3375 Breast Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 3 October 2005) Jackie Baillie*, Shiona Baird*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr David Davidson*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Richard Lochhead*, Eleanor Scott*, Frances Curran*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-3375 Breast Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 3 October 2005) Maureen Macmillan*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Marlyn Glen*, Murdo Fraser*, Kate Maclean*
S2M-3375 Breast Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 3 October 2005) Karen Gillon*, Bill Aitken*

S2M-3375 Mrs Nanette Milne: Breast Cancer Awareness Month—That the Parliament welcomes Breast Cancer Awareness Month 2005; notes that Breast Cancer Awareness Month aims to increase awareness of the disease among both the public and health professionals, raise funds for research into the cause, prevention and cure of the disease and offer vital information and support to those affected, and further notes that breast cancer is the most common cancer in women in Scotland, accounting for one in three of all cancers detected in women living in Scotland. Supported by: Brian Adam, John Scott, Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Robin Harper, Mike Pringle, Fiona Hyslop, Linda Fabiani, Bill Butler, Alex Johnstone, Mary Scanlon, Derek Brownlee, Tommy Sheridan, Christine Grahame, Sarah Boyack, Jackie Baillie, Shiona Baird, Bruce Crawford, Mr David Davidson, Fergus Ewing, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Richard Lochhead, Eleanor Scott, Frances Curran, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Mr Jim Wallace, Mr Adam Ingram, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Rosie Kane, Maureen Macmillan, Dr Elaine Murray, Marlyn Glen, Murdo Fraser, Kate Maclean, Karen Gillon, Bill Aitken, Mr Ted Brocklebank* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-3375 Breast Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 3 October 2005) Phil Gallie*, Susan Deacon*
S2M-3375 Breast Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 3 October 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3375 Breast Cancer Awareness Month (lodged on 3 October 2005) Elaine Smith*
